next_actions: Run initial governance scan to establish baseline
Process any pending drag-drop technology decisions

instructions_for_claude.on_session_start: Read this file first. Process all 'pending_decisions'. Run governance scan if next_scan_due is past.
instructions_for_claude.decision_process: 1. Analyze requirement, 2. Present structured approval request, 3. Wait for user approval, 4. Update this file with decision
instructions_for_claude.state_management: This file contains ALL state. Never assume memory from previous sessions. Always read this file first.
instructions_for_claude.governance_workflow: Run scans weekly. Update this file with results. Track all compliance issues.
